# Introduction

This is a simple up and running guide for building Minecraft mods with
Minecraft Forge. I wrote it because I'm more effective at learning things when
I document them.

For more complete sources, check out:

* [MinecraftForge Official Documentation](http://mcforge.readthedocs.io/en/latest/)
* [Shadowfacts Forge Mods tutorials](https://shadowfacts.net/tutorials/)
